title: Event Management System
description: This project is an Event Management System built using Java, Maven, JDBC, and JavaFX. It allows users to create and manage events, register participants, and handle event logistics.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A React-based weather dashboard that fetches real-time weather data from an API. It includes features such as location-based searches, weather forecasting, and an interactive UI using Tailwind CSS.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. This site showcases projects, skills, and contact information with dynamic animations.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application using Node.js, Express, and WebSockets. Users can create rooms, join them, and communicate in real-time with a fully functional chat interface.

title: E-commerce Store
description: An e-commerce platform built using React and Firebase. It features product listings, a shopping cart, user authentication, and a payment gateway integration.

title: Blog Management System
description: A full-stack blog management system developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). It includes blog creation, editing, and commenting functionality.
